page.title: 18CAMBUSLANG/ GOVERNMENT
page.content: {CAMBUSLANG}is a small town , now in Glasgow,which grew with the old steel works.It has a busy shopping Street. {MOUNT VERNON GREYHOUND TRACK }has meetings about three times per week. {DAVID MARSHALL}M.P. sees himself as the voice of the people of this constituency in Parliament.He deals with the problems of individual constituents and tries to fight for improvements and better conditions within the local area and to campaign against what he considers to be injustice.He fights for the policy of his Political Party. A caring M.P.should try to improve the lot of those less fortunate in not only his own constituency,but in the rest of the world. {COLIN McNICOL}has been over 25 years on the district council while{DOUGLAS {HAY}is our regional councillor.
